text:
@realDonaldTrump @MikeGarcia2020 @GavinNewsom Trump wants his name on the front of the stimulus checks, so that we’ll know of his attempt to buy our silence about the death of Americans.
$1200 / 75000 Coronavirus deaths, works out to less than 2 cents per death payout. That’s a real bargain Mr. President.
